title: I won a game and got demoted.... :'(
body: Hey everyone just thought I'd put it out there that i was just on 22 points in silver 3 won a game and after victory screen i got demoted to s4 which is pretty unfair if you ask me considering the amount of plebs that i have to put up with in my games to achieve this lp anyway there is obviously some spooky stuff going on here I'd like my points back please :D

replies.body: You're probably confused, but you can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and have them take a look.
Alright thanks bro.. Definitely not confused though I'm on oceanic server It's dodgy af lol
